remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，从属性中移除时钟使用此方法时，不会停止这些时钟。Note that using this method to removing clocks from a property does not stop those clocks.

param.name: dp
param.span: 要进行动画处理的属性。

span.span: The property to animate.

param.name: clock
param.span: 用于动画处理指定属性的时钟。

span.span: The clock with which to animate the specified property.

param.span: 如果 handoffBehavior 为 并且 clock 为 ，则将从指定属性删除（而非停止）所有动画。

span.span: If handoffBehavior is and clock is , all animations will be removed from the specified property (but not stopped).

param.span: 如果 handoffBehavior 为 并且 clock 为 ，则此方法不起作用。

span.span: If handoffBehavior is and clock is , this method has no effect.

param.name: handoffBehavior
param.span: 一个值，用来指定新动画应该如何与当前已在影响该属性值的任何动画进行交互。

span.span: A value that specifies how the new animation should interact with any current animations already affecting the property value.

summary.span: 将 应用到指定的 。

span.span: Applies an to the specified .

summary.span: 如果该属性已进行动画处理，则使用指定的 。

span.span: If the property is already animated, the specified is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，使用此方法从属性中移除时钟不会停止这些时钟。Note that using this method to remove clocks from a property does not stop those clocks. ## 使用使用Using the Compose HandoffBehavior 当你将， ，或属性使用 、 任何以前与该属性关联的对象可继续使用系统资源; 计时系统不会自动删除这些时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system will not remove these clocks automatically. 若要避免出现性能问题，当应用大量使用的时钟，完成后，应从属性的基值移除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 删除时钟有多种方法。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要从属性中移除所有时钟，请使用或动画对象的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定正进行动画处理的第一个参数的属性和`null`为第二个。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这将从该属性中删除所有动画时钟。This will remove all animation clocks from the property. - 若要删除特定时钟的列表，从使用属性检索，然后调用方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 这通常是时钟的事件处理程序。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，仅根时钟可以受;子时钟属性将返回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock will return `null`. 另请注意，如果时钟的有效持续时间都是永久性的不会调用事件。Note also that the event will not be called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户将需要确定何时调用。In that case, the user will need to determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 当对某个对象进行垃圾回收时，它的时钟也会断开连接并进行垃圾回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks will also be disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何应用使用不同的动画时钟设置。The following example shows how to apply animation clocks using different settings.

param.name: dp
param.span: 要进行动画处理的属性。

span.span: The property to animate.

param.name: animation
param.span: 用于对指定属性进行动画处理的动画。

span.span: The animation used to animate the specified property.

param.span: 如果动画的 是 ，则移除当前的任何动画，并保持属性的当前值。

span.span: If the animation's is , any current animations will be removed and the current value of the property will be held.

param.span: 如果 animation 为 ，则从属性中移除所有动画，属性值会还原为其基值。

span.span: If animation is , all animations will be removed from the property and the property value will revert back to its base value.

summary.span: 将动画应用于指定 。

span.span: Applies an animation to the specified .

summary.span: 动画会在呈现下一帧时启动。

span.span: The animation is started when the next frame is rendered.

summary.span: 如果指定属性已进行动画处理，则使用 切换行为。

span.span: If the specified property is already animated, the handoff behavior is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果动画大于零，与动画开始这段时间已过后从呈现下一步的帧的时间。If the animation has a that is greater than zero, the animation begins after that amount of time has elapsed from the time the next frame is rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果动画大于零，与动画开始这段时间已过后从呈现下一步的帧的时间。If the animation has a that is greater than zero, the animation begins after that amount of time has elapsed from the time the next frame is rendered. ## 使用使用Using the Compose HandoffBehavior 当你将， ，或属性使用 、 任何以前与该属性关联的对象可继续使用系统资源; 计时系统不会自动删除这些时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system will not remove these clocks automatically. 若要避免出现性能问题，当应用大量使用的时钟，完成后，应从属性的基值移除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 删除时钟有多种方法。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要从属性中移除所有时钟，请使用或动画对象的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定正进行动画处理的第一个参数的属性和`null`为第二个。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这将从该属性中删除所有动画时钟。This will remove all animation clocks from the property. - 若要删除特定时钟的列表，从使用属性检索，然后调用方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 这通常是时钟的事件处理程序。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，仅根时钟可以受;子时钟属性将返回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock will return `null`. 另请注意，如果时钟的有效持续时间都是永久性的不会调用事件。Note also that the event will not be called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户将需要确定何时调用。In that case, the user will need to determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 当对某个对象进行垃圾回收时，它的时钟也会断开连接并进行垃圾回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks will also be disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何应用使用不同的动画设置。The following example shows how to apply animations using different settings. MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable Clone ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable Clone() cil managed
Public Function Clone () As Animatable
public: System::Windows::Media::Animation::Animatable ^ Clone();

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 在复制此对象的依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但它们可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of this instance.

returns.span: 返回的复本实际上是当前对象的深层副本。

span.span: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.

returns.span: 该复本的 属性为 false。

span.span: The clone's property is **false**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象。The method can be used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects. 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承方法以提供强类型的实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited method to provide a strongly typed implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool FreezeCore (bool isChecking);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool FreezeCore(bool isChecking) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function FreezeCore (isChecking As Boolean) As Boolean
protected: override bool FreezeCore(bool isChecking);

param.name: isChecking
param.span: 如果此方法只应确定该实例是否可冻结，则为 。

span.span: if this method should simply determine whether this instance can be frozen.

param.span: 如果调用此方法时该实例实际上应冻结其自身，则为 。

span.span: if this instance should actually freeze itself when this method is called.

summary.span: 使此 对象成为不可修改的对象，或确定是否可使其成为不可修改的对象。

span.span: Makes this object unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 当 为 时，如果可以使此 成为不可修改的，则此方法返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if this can be made unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 当 为 时，如果此 当前不可修改，则此方法返回 ；或者，如果无法使其成为不可修改的，并且副作用是已开始更改此对象的冻结状态，则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the if this is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将返回**false**时是**true**。This method will return **false** when is **true**. 请勿调用此方法，直接 （但调用基实现中）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 内部调用此方法(与`isChecking`等于`true`) 和(与`isChecking`等于`false`)。This method is called internally by (with `isChecking` equal to `true`) and (with `isChecking` equal to `false`).

para.span: 派生自的类必须重写此方法，当类中包含不存储使用依赖项属性的数据。

span.span: Classes that derive from must override this method when the class contains data that is not stored using dependency properties.

para.span: 典型的实现将调用基实现中，然后调用静态方法对所有类型的类包含，返回的属性仅当所有属性都被都冻结 (或可能已被都冻结，请在用例通过传递值)。

span.span: A typical implementation would call the base implementation, then call the static method on all typed properties that the class contains, returning only if all properties were frozen (or could have been frozen, in the case of passing through a value for ).

span.span: Returns the non-animated value of the specified .

returns.span: 在指定的属性未经过动画处理时返回的值。

span.span: The value that would be returned if the specified property were not animated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的属性不进行动画处理，此方法将返回与相同的结果。If the specified property is not animated, this method returns the same result as . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，非动画的动画属性检索和显示值。In the following example, the non-animated values of animated properties are retrieved and displayed. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示一个或多个 对象是否与此对象的任何依赖项属性相关联。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether one or more objects is associated with any of this object's dependency properties.

value.span: **true**如果一个或多个对象是与此对象的依赖项属性的任何相关联; 否则为**false**。

span.span: **true** if one or more objects is associated with any of this object's dependency properties; otherwise, **false**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不指示此对象是否包含动画的子对象。This property does not indicate whether this object contains animated sub-objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用方法来确定是否应序列化属性。The class uses the method to determine if a property should be serialized.
